column1: The Petitioner states that the 10th Respondent had made a complaint to the Criminal
Investigations  Department  (CID)  against  the  Petitioner,  which  had  resulted  in  a  ‘B’
report  being  filed  in  the  Magistrate’s  Court  of  Nugegoda.  This  Court  has  examined
the  said  report,  annexed  to  the  petition  marked
complaint relates to the following three matters:
